data.name: Highway Blossoms - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Includes all of the songs written for Highway Blossoms that you've come to know and love. Cassette tape not included.

Tracklist:


  • Age Old Ghost - Able Kirby
  • Backroads - Smoke Thief
  • Bad Jam Rock - Kevin Turner
  • Black Starlight - Able Kirby
  • Camptown - Able Kirby
  • Conga Wonga - Jake Abernathie
  • Criss-Cross Cactus Man - Jake Abernathie
  • Echo in the Silo - Jake Abernathie
  • Eighteen Wheeler - Smoke Thief
  • Electric Shoehorn - Able Kirby
  • Eleven - Smoke Thief
  • Equinox - Smoke Thief
  • Far Between - Able Kirby
  • Fungiere Runabout - Jake Abernathie
  • Hawaiian and Salt - Jake Abernathie
  • Hitchhiking Wind - Jake Abernathie
  • Hitchhiking Wind (slow) - Jake Abernathie
  • Hit Em' with that C Major Noodling - Kevin Turner
  • Holding On - Smoke Thief
  • Howe's Guitar - Jake Abernathie
  • Lost with the Wind - BAGman
  • Marina's Mixtape - Kevin Turner
  • Nightfall - Smoke Thief
  • Rockstar - Smoke Thief
  • Saint Toribio's Siesta - Jake Abernathie
  • Treasure Huntin - Smoke Thief
  • Trio on Neptune - Jake Abernathie
  • Unsayable Thoughts - Jake Abernathie
  • Winter With You - Smoke Thief

Note about "The Bear Prayer"

Leather Tramp's "The Bear Prayer" was licensed only for distribution with the game and is not included with this soundtrack purchase.
